equitorch.nn.functional

Provides functional implementations of equivariant neural network operations.

sparse_wigner_rotation(input, sincos_alpha, ...)

Applies sparse Wigner D-matrix rotation \(D(lpha, eta, \gamma) = D_z(lpha)D_y(eta)D_z(\gamma)\).

dense_wigner_rotation(input, wigner_d)

Applies a precomputed dense Wigner D-matrix to input features.

wigner_d_matrix(eye[, alpha, beta, gamma, ...])

Computes the dense Wigner D-matrix by applying sparse rotation operations to a provided identity matrix.

align_to_z_wigner_d(eye, xyz, max_m, info[, ...])

Computes Wigner D-matrix \(D(R_{align})\) that rotates vector \(\vec{v}\) to z-axis.
